description:
================================================================

EXTREMELY USEFUL TO UNDERSTAND THE ADVANCE CONCEPTS

OF ORACLE APPLICATIONS R12 INVENTORY

================================================================

At the end of this course, you will get the knowledge of...

Setting up Inventory Module, Defining items and assigning, Inventory transactions, Inventory controls, Inventory planning, Inventory accuracy, On-Hand Availability and On-Hand Quantity
title: Oracle Applications R12 Inventory - Advance
